title: Persimmon chutney
ingredients: ['350ml cider vinegar', '150g chopped onion', '1 large Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and chopped', '150g sultanas', '150g granulated sugar', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 green chilli pepper, seeded and minced', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/8 teaspoon ground cloves', '4 persimmons (Sharon fruit), peeled and chopped']
